title: Euro to U.S. dollar annual average exchange rate 1999 to 2019
summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Exchange rate, containing a total of 21 data points.
In general Exchange rate has stayed the same over the Year.
The most drastic decrease took place within the Year 2014 and 2015.
Maximum Exchange rate, about 1.47 was reported at Year 2008
Minimum Exchange rate about 0.9 was reached at Year 2001
min_summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes Exchange rate. In total the number of data points it has is 21.
Overall Exchange rate has increased over the Year.
